跳过导航链接
  • 概览
  • 程序包
  • 类
  • 树
  • 索引
  • 帮助

All Classes and Interfaces

类
说明
AdministratorController
The AdministratorController class provides Administrator with methods for managing staff, appointments, and medicine inventory.
AdministratorView
The AdministratorView class extends the DashboardView and provides the user interface for the administrator.
Appointment
The Appointment class represents an appointment, which associates a Patient with a Doctor.
AppointmentOutcomeRecord
The AppointmentOutcomeRecord class represents an appointment outcome record, which is part of a Bill and an Appointment.
AppointmentOutcomeRecordStore
The AppointmentOutcomeRecordStore class is responsible for managing the storage and retrieval of Appointment Outcome Records.
AppointmentStatus
Enumeration representing the status of an appointment.
AppointmentStore
The AppointmentStore class is responsible for managing the storage and retrieval of Appointment records.
Bill
The Bill class represents a bill for a patient's appointment outcome record.
DashboardView
The DashboardView class provides common methods for dashboard views, including getting validated user choices, displaying notifications, tips, success and error messages, and a form for changing user password.
DashboardViewFactory
Factory class for creating and managing dashboard views for different users upon successful login.
Doctor
The Doctor class represents a doctor in the system.
DoctorController
The DoctorController class provides Doctor with methods for managing medical records of patients under a doctor's care, accepting or declining appointments, searching for medicines, and recording appointment outcomes.
DoctorStore
The DoctorStore class is responsible for managing the storage and retrieval of Doctor records.
DoctorView
The DoctorView class provides the user interface for doctors.
IPublisher
The IPublisher interface defines the methods that a publisher in the observer pattern must implement.
ISubscriber
The ISubscriber interface defines the methods that a subscriber in the observer pattern must implement.
IUser
The IUser interface provides the contract for user-related operations.
IView
The IView interface represents a view component in the application.
LoginView
The LoginView class provides the user interface for the login functionality of the Hospital Management System.
MedicalRecord
The MedicalRecord class represents a medical record, which is part of a Patient.
Medicine
The Medicine class represents a medicine with details such as stock level, low stock level alert line, replenishment request status, and price.
MedicineStore
The MedicineStore class is responsible for managing the storage and retrieval of Medicine records.
Notification
The Notification class represents a notification message with details about the subject and object involved in an action.
Patient
The Patient class represents a patient in the system.
PatientController
The PatientController class provides Patient with methods for scheduling, rescheduling, and cancelling appointments, viewing scheduled and past appointments, searching for doctors, and printing bills and providing ratings for completed appointments.
PatientStore
The PatientStore class is responsible for managing the storage and retrieval of Patient records.
PatientView
The PatientView class provides the user interface for patients.
PharmacistController
The PharmacistController class provides Pharmacists with methods for managing appointment outcome records, approving prescription requests, getting medicine inventory, and submitting replenishment requests.
PharmacistView
The PharmacistView class provides the user interface for the pharmacists.
Prescription
The Prescription class represents a prescription item provided by a doctor.
PrescriptionStatus
Enumeration representing the status of a prescription.
StaffStore
The StaffStore class is the underlying backstore for staff data (excluding doctors) in the application.
User
The User class represents a user in the system.
UserRole
Enumeration representing the different user roles in the system.
